Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce

Class TestTableInputFormat

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.TestTableInputFormat
public class TestTableInputFormat extends Object
This tests the TableInputFormat and its recovery semantics

      Parameters:
      r - single row result
      key - the row key
      expectedKey - the expected key
      expectedValue - the expected value
      Returns:
